short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bitbucket PR Updates: Smaller tabs, a 'reviewed' button, a toggle collapse button, and code highlighting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to The BitBucket PR Fixer!
BitBucket has long ignored our requests for a better PR process.  Instead of waiting on them, this extension will add some basics that make life MUCH BETTER.

1. Customizable tab spacing (Default 4)
2. Added a "Reviewed" button to each file that will reset if the content changes in a future commit.
3. Added code highlighting.
4. Add a collapse button to hide a code block.
5. Left navigation options (Default is the normal top, click the extension icon to change).
6. Go to "Ignore Whitespace" by default. (Default is off, click the extension icon to change).

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/the-bitbucket-pr-fixer/home
